text: Iodate is an ion. Its chemical formula is . The iodine is in the +5 oxidation state. It can be made by reduction of periodate. They are similar to chlorates. They react with acids to make iodic acid. They are salts of iodic acid. An example would be sodium iodate. ==Related pages== *Iodine compounds Category:Iodine compounds Category:Oxyanions
title: Iodate
